reviewText: Good quality DVD with Sophia Loren beautiful as ever.

This is a wonderful film. Great roles played well by Loren,  Mastroianni and superb Giancarlo Giannini. Beautifully filed I Sicily. It's well done with Loren using her great acting abilities aside from her beauty. The story line is believable and touching. I really enjoy this film and was happy to see it on Amazon instant video
For all those who love Lina Wertmuller movies, this is another brilliant work! Acting is superb. Highly recommended to all movie lovers.
